long_description: Make outdoor cooking easy and fun with the MSR Alpine(TM) Utensil set. Set contains a folding spatula, folding strainer/grater and a folding spoon. Serrated edge on the spatula cuts through soft meats and cheeses. Strainer/grater has curved ridges that fit pot rims for efficient straining; holes work well for grating cheese. Spoon is calibrated for common measurements. Utensils fold with a simple squeeze of the handles and are easy to use when you're wearing gloves.
short_description: Make outdoor cooking easy and fun with the MSR Alpine(TM) Utensil set.
